text:
@HillaryClinton What do you think, @HillaryClinton, are the campaign staffers of Donald and the other minions thinking when they know that COVID-19 kills 3 times more Blacks that Whites?

A: that's sad let's stop the virus.
B: they're not voting for us anyways.

What do you really think? https://t.co/XbAFfiiBnJ
